mapper.insert: insert into feedlike(feed_idx, user_idx, like_type) values(#{feedIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{likeType});
mapper.update: update feedlike set like_type = #{likeType} where user_idx = #{userIdx} and feed_idx = #{feedIdx};
mapper.delete: delete from feedlike where user_idx = #{userIdx} and feed_idx = #{feedIdx};
